entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 03:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 15 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then to 80 gusting to 110 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind north 90 km/h gusting to 130. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
